timeline.bodyText: Should we maybe use the 2.0.6 one instead?
timeline.author: CarlosTalend

replies.bodyText: I don't see a reason of updating it unless there are any issues. It's the idea of versioning.
replies.author: amedvedenko

replies.bodyText: Since Studio removes duplicated jars in the classpath, if by any chance a user runs Databricks jobs from a DI job with such components, I wonder if there could be issues when building, e.g., through a CI like Azure Devops, if the 2.0.1 version is loaded before the 2.0.6
replies.author: CarlosTalend

replies.bodyText: ok, then let's do it in a separate work item because I didn't change it and it works.
replies.author: amedvedenko
